log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Sunset Through Mountains</title>
</head>
<body>
    <svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
        <!-- Background gradient -->
        <defs>
            <linearGradient id="sunrise" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
                <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ff9a9e"/>
                <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#fad0c4"/>
            </linearGradient>
        </defs>
        <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#sunrise)"/>
        <!-- Mountains -->
        <path d="M0 400 L800 400 L800 300 L600 250 L400 300 L200 200 L0 300 Z" fill="#2c3e50"/>
        <path d="M0 300 L800 300 L800 250 L650 200 L500 150 L350 100 L200 120 L0 200 Z" fill="#34495e"/>
        <!-- Sun -->
        <circle cx="700" cy="150" r="50" fill="#f1c40f"/>
    </svg>
</body>
</html>","file_name":"index.html"}
